sections.section_instructions:
Reading Passage has nine paragraphs, A-I.

Choose the correct heading for paragraphs A and C-I from the list of headings below.

Write the correct number, i-xii, in boxes 30-35 on your answer sheet.

shared_options.viii: The mathematical basis of earlier design

sections.section_instructions:
Do the following statements agree with the information given in Reading Passage?

In boxes 36-40 on your answer sheet, write:

TRUE if the statement agrees with the information
FALSE if the statement contradicts the information
NOT GIVEN if there is no information on this.

questions.question_text: The quality of any particular note played on the same violin varies.
Scientific instruments analyse complex sound more accurately than humans.
The quality of handmade violins varies according to the musical ability of the craftsman.
Modern violins seem to improve in their early years.
Modern violins are gaining in popularity amongst the top violinists.
